backend/main.mo: Defines core types, ring buffer utilities, and state for DEX configs, price snapshots, arbitrage signals, latency metrics, and shadow trade simulation.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global theme variables and styles defining light/dark mode tokens and layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component with sidebar, header, notification center, routed content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AutoRefreshContr: Toggleable auto-refresh component using intervals to trigger periodic refresh callbacks.
frontend/src/components/BacktestPanel.ts: Displays shadow execution metrics and trade logs with status badges and tables.
frontend/src/components/CkBtcIcpRatioSpa: Renders a simple SVG sparkline for ckBTC/ICP ratio samples with min/max display.
frontend/src/components/CkBtcIcpRatioWid: Real-time ckBTC/ICP ratio monitor with sample collection, sparkline chart, deviation detection, and UI states for loading and errors.
frontend/src/components/DecisionHistoryT: Displays decision events with filtering, timestamps, result badges, and a dialog for viewing detailed event data.
frontend/src/components/ExecutionBlocked: Shows a static panel explaining that trade execution is not implemented and lists required DEX integration details.
frontend/src/components/LatencySignalsPa: Displays latency metrics with latest values, rolling averages, spike detection, and a table of recent operations.
frontend/src/components/LiveDataSourceCo: Provides controls to enable or disable the live data source loop, showing status indicators and environment-specific messages.
frontend/src/components/LiveDetectionsPa: Shows recent signal detection events with timestamps, price deltas, risk indicators, and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/MarketSnapshotGr: Displays a grid of price snapshots from multiple DEX sources for a trading pair, with timestamp formatting and detail dialogs.
frontend/src/components/NotificationCent: Renders system warnings with timestamps and allows clearing individual or all warnings.
frontend/src/components/OptimizerPanel.t: Shows optimizer dataset stats, recent timestamps, and a placeholder UI for running on-chain optimization.
frontend/src/components/PipelineStatusPa: Visualizes pipeline step status, latest decision timestamps, and latency metrics in a staged flow.
frontend/src/components/SensoryCortexPan: Simulates DEX price polling, computes spread and volatility, stores price points, and displays arbitrage viability.
frontend/src/components/SideNav.tsx: Provides a sidebar navigation menu highlighting the active route with icons.
frontend/src/components/SnapshotDetailsD: Shows detailed info for a price snapshot including reserves and raw response with copy support.
frontend/src/components/StrategyParamete: UI panel showing mock strategy parameter versions with status badges and parameter category list.
frontend/src/components/SystemReadyIndic: Displays system readiness based on backend status with tooltips explaining missing conditions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationCenter: React hook exposing notification center warnings with add, remove, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend calls like DEX configs, decision history, system status, and agent control.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/src/lib/analysis.ts: Implements spread analysis logic calculating profit, signal type, and reasoning for trading decisions.
frontend/src/lib/notificationCenter.ts: In‑memory notification system supporting warnings, subscriptions, and predefined warning IDs.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining class names using clsx and tailwind‑merge.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Input validators for canister IDs and trading pair configuration fields.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AgentPage.tsx: Provides UI to start/stop the agent, view pipeline status, latency metrics, live data controls, sensory cortex state, and decision history.
frontend/src/pages/ConfigurationPage.tsx: Manages DEX configurations, pair settings, and canister ID overrides with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ExecutionPage.tsx: Displays execution-mode warning and requires user acknowledgment before enabling real trade execution.
frontend/src/pages/MarketWatchPage.tsx: Shows multi-source market data with manual/auto refresh, Binance snapshot recording, ratio widget, and DEX snapshot grids.
frontend/src/pages/SelfImprovementPage.t: Hosts backtesting, optimization, strategy parameters, and live detection panels for model self-improvement.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining themes, colors, typography, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, capabilities, and implemented features for the quant agent and dashboard.
